## getFeatureName() function

Determine the name of (OMV) feature. It implements the special handling required to determine the text content of a feature from its tags, which are passed in as the `env`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getFeatureName(env: Env, basePropName: string | undefined, useAbbreviation?: boolean, useIsoCode?: boolean, languages?: string[]): string | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  env | [Env](./harp-datasource-protocol.env.md) | Environment containing the tags from the (OMV) feature. |
|  basePropName | string \| undefined |  |
|  useAbbreviation | boolean | <code>true</code> to use the abbreviation if available. |
|  useIsoCode | boolean | <code>true</code> to use the tag "iso\_code". |
|  languages | string\[\] | List of languages to use, for example: Specify "en" to use the tag "name\_en" as the text of the string. Order reflects priority. |

<b>Returns:</b>

string \| undefined
